s.text: We're going to go broke buying all these power tools.")
We're going to go broke buying all these power tools.")

For all the attention given to electronic commerce of late, and the incredibly high valuation being given to companies that lose scads of money, some of the business on the Web is little more than a glorified version of selling crap on the Internet.
To me, it has the potential to sweep away ignorance about such topics as gay and racial hatred and empower people to take more control of their lives.

I hope so, although I was not heartened by an article I read this morning in the Los Angeles Times about the fact that despite numerous hate crimes laws on the books, few are being implemented by police, who appear to decline to report obvious hate crimes as such.
